job.title: Machine Learning Software Engineer / Senior - Lead
job.description: An ecommerce tech company in Chicago is looking to bring on a hybrid Software & Machine Learning Engineer to work on a variety of computer vision and NLP projects. The role is looking for someone who is very comfortable in Python programming and building out Machine Learning models from scratch, as well as someone who can help deploy their models into production.  This role needs someone who not only has used Machine learning, but also someone who comes from a strong computer engineering background to be able to work closely with the software developers on the full life cycle of the data projects.  This is a true hybrid role between engineering and Machine Learning/Deep Learning- so if you're looking to take on the next step in your career make sure to apply today! The Offer Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future. This position does not offer sponsorship. No C2C or 3rd parties please. Sydney Weaver
